parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The accelerated domain name.

> You can specify only one domain name in each call.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. The interval between the start time and end time must be less than 30 days. Example: 2016-10-21T04:00:00Z.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: integers from **1** to **1000**.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description:
The paths that you want to query. Separate paths with forward slashes (/). If you do not set this parameter, all paths are queried. If you set the value to a directory, it must end with a forward slash (/).

> Fuzzy match is not supported. If you want data to be collected based on a directory, you can specify a specific directory, for example, directory/path/. In this case, bandwidth data is collected based on directory/path/.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC. Example: 2016-10-20T04:00:00Z.
